messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Engine gonna detonate, time to go

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Engineering is a crater so I guess we have to leave. Feel free to fucking beat the fuck out of the engineer for fucking up this hard.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Whoever does mining gets rewarded heavily, come to HOP office to get a job change.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: H E L P eR  (Cyborg)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">HUMAN HARM! HUMAN HARM! HUMAN HARM! HUMAN HARM! I reccommand immediate evacuation! HUMAN HARM! HUMAN HARM! HUMAN HARM!</font>
